attributes.action: UK Government to restrict items shoppers can buy due to COVID19 in supermarkets
attributes.additional_details:
We would like to urge the UK government to set a limit on how much people can buy as shelves are empty in major retail outlets and supermarkets. People are purchasing more than is necessary which makes it hard for the elderly and vulnerable to get what they require.
They should restrict supermarkets from selling bulk to customers.
attributes.background: We would like to urge the UK government to set a limit on how much people can buy as shelves are empty in major retail outlets and supermarkets. People are purchasing more than is necessary which makes it hard for the elderly and vulnerable to get what they require.
